description: This file defines the API interface for the Transport Layer Security (TLS) Module Container, including function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling, and initializing the module container object.

methods.name: TlsCreateModuleContainer
methods.description: Creates a new TLS module container object with specified context handles.

methods.name: TlsMcoCreate
methods.description: Instantiates a new TLS Module Container.

methods.name: TlsMcoRemove
methods.description: Removes and cleans up the specified TLS Module Container.

methods.name: TlsMcoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects into the TLS Module Container.

methods.name: TlsMcoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the TLS Module Container object.
